long_description: Playing, training or competing at the highest levels of exercise intensity and duration? Fueling up with the PowerBar Performance Energy Wafer Bar can make a huge impact on how you feel and perform. Bar is formulated with a 2:1 glucose to fructose blend, found to deliver 20 - 50% more energy to muscles than glucose alone. Layers of crispy wafers and filling are pre-scored to be broken into 2 pieces for easy consumption before or during athletic training and competition. Combine with a carb-based meal 2 - 4 hours before exercise or consume as a snack 30-60 minutes before exercise. Consume 1 or 2 PowerBar Performance Energy Wafer Bars per hour during exercise that lasts for over an hour. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Playing, training or competing at the highest levels of exercise intensity and duration? Fueling up with the PowerBar Performance Energy Wafer Bar can make a huge impact on how you feel and perform.
